name: Game-Play Demo
description:
Hey all! I hope you enjoy this, but the main purpose of this build is to make sure the game works properly. If you have any tips, comments, or concerns, leave a comment below. Thanks!

By the way, Press Escape to pause and change graphics quality.

__________________________________________________________

Download Instructions:

1. Download

2. Extract the files from the zip you downloaded

4. This is my bad, but you must rename the folder called "ProjectTest_Data" to "Demo_Data". It will not run if you do not.

3. Open the file named Demo.exe

__________________________________________________________
